The UNDO function lets you
undo a bad throw.

Double your coins for
an amazing score with this great offer!

POP_TXT_CMPGLDBAL_INTERSTITIAL:
You got a Golden Ball!
Use this chance to boost your score!
POP_TXT_CMPGLDBAL_BOTOPTIN: Turn on the message to get Golden Ball!
MSG_TXT_BUYERR: An error occurred when purchasing the item. Please check your connection and try again.
MSG_TXT_COINERR: An error occurred when acquiring coins. Please check your connection and try again.
MSG_TXT_ADERR: An error occurred when loading ads. Please try again.
MSG_TXT_FRQADERR: An error occurred as ads were refreshing too frequently. Please wait and try again.
MSG_TXT_APVRSERR: There was an error with the Messenger app. Please try updating the app.
MSG_TXT_NTWERR: There was an error with the request. Please check your network and try again.
MSG_TXT_APIERR: An unknown API-related error occurred. Please wait a few minutes and try again.
SHR_TXT_LVUP: <playerName> just leveled up! Let's focus on techniques to improve performance.
UI_TXT_DLYLGNMORE: Please come back tomorrow for more!
TXT_FRIEND_PICK_CUSTOM_WIN: You win! Practice more, and win more!
TXT_FRIEND_PICK_CUSTOM_LOSE: Too bad... Practise more, and you will definitely win next time! YOU can do it!
TXT_FRIEND_PICK_CUSTOM_DRAW: Let's show respect to our rivals who fought equally!
TXT_UI_GOLDEN_TICKET_MAIN: All throws in your next game will be Golden Balls!
MSG_TXT_CSTM_BAL1: A fast ball with good linearity. Good to take single pins down!
MSG_TXT_CSTM_BAL2: A faster ball with better linearity. Better to take single pins down!
MSG_TXT_CSTM_BAL3: A super fast ball with super good linearity. Super good to take single pins down!
MSG_TXT_CSTM_BAL4: A ball with high hook capabilities. Good for splits!
MSG_TXT_CSTM_BAL5: A ball with better hook capabilities. Better for splits conversions!
MSG_TXT_CSTM_BAL6: A ball with super hook capabilities. Super good for splits!
MSG_TXT_CSTM_BAL7: A big and powerful ball. No gutter!
MSG_TXT_CSTM_BAL8: A big and more powerful ball. No gutter!
MSG_TXT_CSTM_BAL9: A big and super powerful ball. No more gutter!
NOTICE_001_TXT: *Purchased custom balls can be used with no restrictions.
